task_description: Build Myro Productions personal portfolio website - a single-page Next.js application with 5 sections (Hero, Services, Portfolio, About, Contact), featuring dark mossy green color palette, carbon fiber textures, parallax scrolling, and smooth animations.

patterns.server_vs_client: Server Components by default; use 'use client' directive only for interactive components (animations, filters, forms)
patterns.tailwind_v4_import: Use @import 'tailwindcss' NOT @tailwind directives; define custom theme in @theme block
patterns.gsap_cleanup: Always use useGSAP hook for automatic cleanup; register plugins before use
patterns.animation_components: Create wrapper components for FadeIn and Parallax to encapsulate animation logic

existing_implementations.description: Greenfield project - no existing code. Following Next.js 15, Tailwind v4, Motion, and GSAP best practices from official documentation.

tech_decisions.animations: Motion for UI interactions, GSAP+ScrollTrigger for parallax

design_system.typography: Clean modern sans-serif with strong hierarchy
design_system.textures: Carbon fiber background patterns via CSS
